title: Gold
content:
I've been having fun working on this sans. Any thoughts on how I could fix the Y and y? Notice any other problems? Sorry, no punctuation or numerals.   
   
 ![gold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414205140im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/1589.jpg)
author: glutton

comments.content:
'y's - maybe pull them above the baseline like   
you did with your 'j's. They might not look so   
big then.   
   
Stephen
I was also thinking of changing the LC p to make it more resemble a reversed LC q...

I don't mind that the y has a descender, but the spacing between the bowl and the tail just doesn't work. Maybe try pulling the bowl up a ways.   
   
(btw is that a proper use of the term 'bowl'?)
